13.eng-name: The Book on Divorce and Li'an
13.ara-name: كتاب الطلاق واللعان عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Yazid bin Rukanah narrated from his father, from his grandfather who said:'O Messenger of Allah! I irrevocably divorced my wife.' So he said: 'What did you intend by that?' I said: 'One (divorce).' He said: '(Do you swear) By Allah?' I said: 'By Allah.' He said: 'Then it is as you intended

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّجُلِ يُطَلِّقُ امْرَأَتَهُ الْبَتَّةَ
chapter.eng-name: What has been related about a man who divorces his wife irrevocably
